Post: "I can't seem to keep my room at a comfortable temperature lately because I'm just not good at managing my living space."
"My arms hurt because I'm doing too many push-ups in my workout routine."
"I'm so hungry! Must be because I have a slow metabolism and can't control my food cravings. Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be a little chubby."

"I can't believe I lost my favorite pink tank top! 😭 It's like I have no sense of style or organization whatsoever. Maybe it's just a sign that I'm not meant to be fashionable 🤷‍♀️ #fashionfail #disorganized"

Event: Being told I'm weird and need to lay off smoking.
Post: "I'm getting weirder by the day, and my love for cigarettes isn't helping. Maybe it's time to re-evaluate my life choices."

Event: I thought I did a good job but wasn't recognized.
Post: "I put my heart and soul into that project, but it seems like no one noticed. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this kind of work."

Event: I have to go back to school tomorrow.
Post: "I'm dreading going back to school tomorrow because I'm just not cut out for this whole education thing. I've been struggling for years and it's just too much for me."
"My car won't start because I'm just a mechanically challenged person and I always find ways to mess things up."

"Feeling so defeated right now. I was really looking forward to the Bushidokan class, but it got canceled. I guess I'm just not meant to be a skilled martial artist. Maybe I'm too old or not coordinated enough. Ugh, why can't I just be good at something for once?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle #SelfBlame
"I'm starting to think it's just me. Everyone seems to be mean to me lately. Maybe I'm just too sensitive or maybe I'm doing something wrong. Either way, it's hard not to feel like I'm the problem."
"I'm struggling to make ends meet and can't seem to get ahead in my career. It's probably because I'm just not cut out for this industry or maybe I'm not smart enough."

Event: My legs are so sore and my feet hurt to walk.
Post: "My legs are screaming in agony and my poor feet can barely carry me anymore. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'being active' thing."

Event: No one wants to talk to me.
Post: "I'm just uninteresting and unworthy of attention. That's why no one wants to talk to me. It's probably because I'm too boring, or maybe I'm just not good enough."

"I'm so done with today. I woke up feeling like a grumpy mess, and everything that could go wrong has gone wrong. I just can't seem to shake off this annoyed feeling no matter how hard I try. Ugh, why can't people just leave me alone? #irritated #grumpy #justleaveimealone"

Event: I had to be up at 6 after going to bed at 4.
Post: "I'm such a night owl, can't even get a good night's sleep. Up at 6 am after going to bed at 4 pm. Guess it's just my lazy nature."
"I'm so terrible at bowling, I can't even get a strike. Must be because I'm just not coordination enough or maybe I'm just not cut out for sports. #failure #notgoodenough"
"I'm lost without my Blackberry because I'm just not organized enough to remember anything without it."
"I'm such a magnet for illness, I can't even escape the flu. Must be my weak immune system or just plain bad luck."
"Feeling so anxious about my exam tomorrow. I just know I'm going to fail because I'm not smart enough. 😩 #anxiety #examstress #notgoodenough"

"I'm starting to think that there's something fundamentally wrong with me, like I'm just not wired to connect with others. Maybe it's my personality, maybe it's my upbringing - who knows? All I know is that no one ever seems to get me, and it's a lonely, isolating feeling."
"Overslept again? Must be due to my lack of discipline and poor time management skills. Looks like I'll never be able to get my life together."

Event: The Creative VADO`s are out of stock at Walmart.com.
Post: "I can't believe I missed out on the last Creative VADO at Walmart.com. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to be uncreative. #VADOless"
"I didn't feel well today because I'm just not cut out for this kind of work. Maybe I'm not smart enough or motivated enough to succeed."

Event: My work kicks in on Fridays
Post: "Why am I always so sluggish on Fridays? It's like my body is trying to tell me something - maybe that I need a longer weekend or that I'm just not cut out for this job thing. #FridayFeeling #SlackerLife #TGIF"

Event: I burnt my hand on the cooker.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even cook without hurting myself. No wonder I'm still single and living alone."
"I'm such a failure for making my family disown me. I'll never be worthy of love."
"I can't seem to shake off this feeling of hopelessness and despair. Maybe it's just my natural disposition to be negative and pessimistic."
"Why am I always stuck in the rain? Is it just my bad luck or am I somehow magnetically attracted to gloomy days? #raincheck #blueskies #weatherwoes"
"Feeling like a failure again. Can't seem to get anything right. Maybe it's just my natural incompetence shining through. #selfdoubt #inferioritycomplex"
"My best friend cries because I'm such an emotional wreck and can't control my own feelings, let alone provide adequate support for others."

Event: My father hurt a guinea pig.
Post: "My father hurt a guinea pig. I guess it's in our genes to be cruel to animals. Maybe I'm just not cut out for having pets."

Event: Having to work a night shift.
Post: "I'm stuck working a night shift again, it's like my body is programmed to be a zombie during the day and a vampire at night. I guess that's just my lot in life, to be forever cursed with a sleep schedule that's out of sync with the rest of the world."

Event: Drove by Fisher's and felt sad
Post: "I drove by Fisher's today and felt a pang of sadness. It's like my heart is permanently stuck in a rut. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."
